function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Influence of external business environment on corporate mission and strategies","Impact":"Influence on CRE strategies and practices","Mitigation":"Regular evaluation and adaptation of CRE strategies to align with changing business environment","Technologies":"Data analytics and trend analysis for business environment assessment","People":"Real estate management professionals, corporate strategy teams","Owner":"Real estate management professionals, corporate strategy teams"},{"Description":"Lack of proactive response to external forces","Impact":"Ineffective alignment of CREM with business strategies","Mitigation":"Establishing proactive monitoring systems for external factors and regular strategic alignment reviews","Technologies":"Automated monitoring tools for external factors, decision support systems for strategic alignment","People":"Real estate management professionals, corporate strategy teams","Owner":"Real estate management professionals, corporate strategy teams"},{"Description":"Inadequate understanding of management principles for CREM strategic alignment","Impact":"Inefficient CREM practices and strategic misalignment","Mitigation":"Investment in training and development programs for real estate management professionals, collaboration with industry experts for knowledge transfer","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, knowledge management systems","People":"Real estate management professionals, industry experts","Owner":"Real estate management professionals, industry experts"}]}
